00016 RequestHandler::RequestHandler(unsigned int seed,
00017                                double discard_probability,
00018                                const History& history) : history_(history),
00019                                                          discard_probability_(discard_probability),
00020                                                          distribution_generator_(new DistributionGenerator(seed)) {
00021     distribution_generator_->init_bernoulli(discard_probability_);
00022 }

00024 RequestHandler::~RequestHandler() {};

00026 void RequestHandler::handle_request(boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> world_information,
00027                                     boost::shared_ptr<const Request> request) {
00028     if (!distribution_generator_->get_value_bernoulli()) {
00029         handle_request_reliable(world_information, request);
00030     }
00031 }
